ygData.subject: Re: A good idea, Dark Elves especially please read.
ygData.msgSnippet: heh, in beta when last names were a rare and mysterous thing, I used to stand hidden at the entrance to neriak watching the guard killers.  As soon as one of
ygData.messageBody:
heh, in beta when last names were a rare and mysterous thing, I used to
stand hidden at the entrance to neriak watching the guard killers. As soon
as one of the guards would say something I would have already typed, "Its
_______ like you who have ruined your own lands, you will not ruin mine"
then charge at them and hit my "Salr Vanguard has slashed you for 48 points
of damage" "Salr Vanguard has kicked you for 27 points of damage" macro. Of
course at that time I was red to the people killing guards, they'd look at
me, I could tell they were con'ing me, then RUN like hell.

Once I chased a group thru the zone line, where they sat in total confusion
when I zoned across. "WTF it zoned, RUN" then they ran to the guards and
seriously looked confused when I just stood there just outside of guard
range, then charged when they attempted to move away from the guard. I kept
them shivering in fear for a good 5 minutes before one of them figured out I
was a player :)

Gotta admit having a last name like Vanguard musta helped....oh well, I like
D'Taynkk better :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mifsud, Michael [mailto:Michael.Mifsud@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 8:28 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] A good idea, Dark Elves especially please
> read.
>
>
> From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
>
> I was thinking a quest which you could not do UNTIL level 40 or 45 (anyone
> actually know what level a dragoon is?)
>
> I even have my battle macro ready for level 40 :)
>
> "Face the skilled fury of a Neriak Dragoon!"
>
> Dragoon Jaade D'Vinn (one day anyway).
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 25, 1999 11:40 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] A good idea, Dark Elves especially please
> > read.
> >
> > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> >
> > Good idea.....Dragoon Salr D'Taynkk.....I like the sound of that :)
> >
> > but there should be a quest associated with it, like the paladins, not
> > just acheiving a certain level.
> >
> > >>> "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...> 5.24.99 9:18:52 PM >>>
> > From: "Mifsud, Michael" <Michael.Mifsud@...>
> >
> > I saw a good idea posted on the eqvault board regarding Paladins who do
> > the
> > knight of truth quest getting a sir added to there name. I
> typed feedback
> > for this, since I think its a good idea.
> >
> > It then occurred to me, why cant Dark Elf warriors get a similar title.
> > Why
> > cant we get Dragoon added to our names when we hit level 45 (or whatever
> > level the Dragoons are). Either get it automatically, IF we want it or
> > perform a quest to get it.
> >
> > I already wrote feedback on this, if anyone else thinks its a good idea,
> > could I ask you all to write some feed back :) ?
> >
> > thanks.
> >
